tagline: Ruby on Rails NumberHelpers written in CoffeeScript

name: NumberHelpers in CoffeeScript
body:
## Problem ##
Now that View Code is migrating more to BackBone (or JS) rendered context, the useful Rails NumberHelpers are not available. 

## Solution ##
A CoffeeScript implementation of the Rails NumberHelpers solves this problem with a consistent api regardless of the View context.
